entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -41.9°C

Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 10:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
